attributes.additional_details:
We demand the UK government to make available more funding , local support groups and information for migraine sufferers.  Migraine should not be classified as a headache. Migraine is a very challenging disability.  Sufferers go through paralysis, speech disturbance, double vision confusion, memory loss and many more symptoms.

Chronic migraine sufferers , hemiplegic migraine sufferers and basilar migraine sufferers all go through painful symptoms , some on a daily basis.

Most of these types of migraines mimic a stroke.
